messages.message:
Hey, cypress is failing on my PR again because of a permission denied error when trying to create the sandbox due to not being able to add users

```Setting up commercial user:
Error: Permission denied. support-testing_instabase.com (http://support-testing_instabase.com) is not authorized to add users to cypress-org-61138
/home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/cypress/create-user-and-org.js:50
    throw Error(error.msg ?? error.message);
          ^

Error: Permission denied. support-testing_instabase.com (http://support-testing_instabase.com) is not authorized to add users to cypress-org-61138
    at catchStatusCodeError (/home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/cypress/create-user-and-org.js:50:11)
    at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)
    at async addUserToOrg (/home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/cypress/create-user-and-org.js:108:5)
    at async main (/home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/cypress/create-user-and-org.js:277:3)```
cc @Xindi Xu I think you worked on adding users for each cypress run?

i previously started a thread for this here (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CSY11CK7T/p1723245403709559)

i ran into this right before the crafting sandbox deployments started failing, and it’s reoccurring now that the deployments are fixed
I really gotta start scrolling up before posting the same thing you have :sweat_smile::sweat_smile:
haha at least we know other people are also having the same problem, and it’s not just us!
So for both PR, the org doesn't exist. Have you tried rerunning?
i already reran since the first time i got the error on Friday

the logs for one of my PRs (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/actions/runs/10360682717/job/28688562208?pr=61195) show that the org was created though
```Setting up commercial org:
Success! Org name: cypress-org-61195```
Yea, but it's not found :thinking_face:
I'm looking into this.
I previously added code to check if the org exists before creating the org and it seems to break the script. I'll revert this

Here's the fix:
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/61283
should we rebase? @Xindi Xu
sry, CI failed at this PR and I'm re-running it.
Would be great if anyone can force merge the PR
i can force merge!
@Serena perfect! Thank you

the CI failure is quite weird… https://jenkins.instabase.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/instabase/detail/PR-61283/2/pipeline i’ve never seen this one before

anyways it’s force merged now!
awesome, i'll rebase my prs then
hopefully don't see the ci issue after rebase
oh, I clicked "Restart Submit CI metrics to Testmo" but it failed. I can't tell why it failed the 1st time
we should be all good for Cypress CI now! all issues from Friday / yesterday have been resolved, and Cypress CI is passing for multiple PRs :tada: :blob_excited:
